QuestData.Title: A Great Escape
QuestData.Description: A goren tunnel!$b$bOnce the cap is cleared, it's certain to lead outside of this Light-forsaken pit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Clear the goren tunnel and use it to meet with Rexxar outside the Fissure of Fury.
QuestData.RewardText: Those goren tunnels have proven useful.
